value: Yan kills me. He just tells it like it is.
Not a pest but chicken-brain (or in Korean , bungo, small fish, stupid person)
so upset at the mention of Gyandari... could you be missing him too... or even more than Willam the Precious?
and the jerk's very hurt
LJH's so thin @@
lol this man is so incongruent
BJ and Yan have the same expression when they see PG
her reaction - it's clear who stole her heart, and it ain't Willam
"She really came after William" - his thoughts? Must be painful
I don't like Seowoo's pout - she uses it too much to express all kinds of feelings. She should practice some more subtle facial expressions
bravo BJ - give all your attention to the one who's not hurt . I simply wanna shake her sometimes
BJ's words must have hurt PG... Can't she at least ask him how he is?
what a great lost to cut these scenes...
upset because the potter seems to read his feelings for BJ?
she just pouted again. annoying
Yeah, right. She doesn't look worried to me at all.
LOL the lover BJ worries indeed; it's like "cmon, take the medicine, take, take..."
why dont' they answer? suppose they don't even know what they are to each other
They used to be so free with each other, and now AWKWARD. We all know what that means, don't we? William will leave for England alone, methink
She reallyl is such a kid - doesn't understand anything
does it bother you that you wouldn't say a simple thank you and goodbye to someone who saved your silly self numerous times?
He's like: I shouldn't feel guilty?
The fearless Jeju diver doesn't let herself be pushed away by PG's protestations.
Surprised? Of course because all you worried about was your precious baby Will
I cant control myself evertime i see him like literally
Get it now why he was so upset with you in the harbour?
Is he trying again to tell her in his shy way? In spite of her following Will?
She sooo knows here that he's confessing but plays dumb. Why or why BJ wouldn't you encourage him?
People always blame PG for hiding his feelings. BJ with her Will talk and Will walk makes it hard for PG to confess anything.
and he tried... He's quite shy
Her careless attending to his wound is so symbolic of how she treats his heart. And then comes W's voice...
Wil feels insecure maybe?
run bojin, run. will has been w/o you for ... what 2 mins. he can wither 'n'' die if you don't show up
she is as thick as fog in a valley
Aigoo! Bojin. You are worse than PG when it comes to expressing your true feelings
"She really doesn't care for me..." - his thoughts?
Urgh, you silly girl, give him a ray of a green light at least...
He looked like he wanted to say something to her more (to her back!) and then gave up.
She doesn't need to fish for compliments from you, That's all you do: sweet-talk her
ha! again, will feels something's fishy... marks his territory immediately
she should be looking very happy - "If I am only with William..." she said to the old King on Tamna. Does she look happy?
why so sure that PG will let you two go? even will trusts him... for now
the discovery of infamous sauna?
PG must feel like a huge third wheel with these two chirping away
haha! it's like the two are fighting who could impress her more with the greatness of their home towns
Haha. She looks super cute!
Will thinks that too
YOu think I'm pretty, too, Gyandari?
... but she wants to hear it from PG. lol
LOL - PG is so jealous and annoyed by their playfulness

So, is this the origin of boiled eggs in saunas??? hahaha
witty Kyu:-)
LOL I guess you're wrong about that my poor PG
LOL
thats a first too that she does something for PG before William
Aigoo! His jealosy is palpable.
Aigoo - could PG be more miserable watching these two kids and their games?
Haha yeah right, we can see that
Dramaqueen much?
Ooooh, I feel PG's pain. To watch someone you love (seemingly?) love someone else is unbearable, isn't it?
"The lover BJ looks really worried about PG" - not!
Geez, he's breaking my fricking heart with this face. Fine acting mr. Im
He believes she loves Will and is letting her go. That is true love
He' s a bottle blond BOjin dear - and this hair looks awful. Awful!
it's pointless, too. since you are leaving
Frankly, willY, hair doesn't make any difference. You look weird no matter what
booh you're not fun PK  :P hahaha
why does he go out and immeditely go back? cannot stand to see these two love birds
And here comes the universal Seowoo pout. What are you expressing here, exactly?
Poor PG, inside always hikding his feelings.
I wish you could, too. she just keep hurting you
BJ is really a woman of action - need to find out what's cooking immediately
just leave finally and let him be...
very confident now in the 'let's undress' PG
Lord Park Gyu in front of William but when alone with PG she switches to informal speech and Gyandari. Is she all that innocent, after all?
You blew it BJ: PG will keep both his shirt and his heart closed to you.
Did she forget why she left Tamna?
Lying to herself; she came as much to see Gyandari as she did to find William
BJ, it aint' gonna be easy. YOu won't be killed, but surely treated as an exotic animal - feared, wondered at and ridiculed. It's th 17th centuyr England, not today
William is starting to realize that BJ has changed, isn't he?
Why these doubts, "suddenly" BJ? Why won't you look into your heart of hearts?
And William couldn't cope with his mother alone. Will he be able to defend you? Imagine mother's reaction to the wild mermaid from Jeju.
PG does all these wonderfully noble acts to make BJ happy - too bad she's so unaware of them and so thick to understand
He really cares for Bojin....
the potter just hinted Kyu for the other person:-)
Playing (oriental) doctor. If I were PG I'd be nervous taking something prepared from these two airheads
William happy but Bojin... hmmm
Shouldn't you be happy BJ? Didn't you say "I'll go anywhere with William.? What's wrong with Nagasaki. Ah, yes: no Gyandari there.
Yan seems to read everyone's feelings
LOL why suddenly so worried? You seemed quite cheerful earlier. Could it be an excuse not to leave?
Ah, William, I know you're hurting but why can't I feel anything for you? Maybe cuz you are so clingy and needy?
Bojin, bojin... you can swing both ways unfortunately
I think BJ would have been perfectly happy staying like this forever, with both of her guys next to her.
Too bad PG and Will don't want to share
You can hug the medicinal herbs all you want... but the chance to look after PG is gone
and we see her true colours shining true - she's hiding some serious PG sarang in her heart, isn't she?
His ears are on fire! lol
Bojin, this is not the kind of medicine PG needs from you,..
Is she over - compensating for all those times when she neglected PG? too late, darling, too late
and you will quickly forget this favour later, you silly boy and think PG wants you dead. aigo!!!
PG is utterly miserable ㅠㅠ
Shouldn't Will greet PG with a bow, Korean way? After all that PG has done for him... the least Willie can do
Is it just me, or does Yan sound angry even when he's saying nice things?
Why does he sound so spiteful here?
Poor BJ she's hoping for one last big 'good-bye" scene but...
Oh, so now it's back to Gyandari, not Park Gyu Naeuri? It's not gonna work, You blew it, girl.
She's almost cooing now
no kidding? why wouldn't you say goodbye to him on Tamna?
BJ, do you know now how PG felt as he was about to leave Tamna for good and you seemed not to care an ounce about it? poetic justice
He can't come out because he doesn't want anyone to see his embarrassingly miserable state
It' finally dawned on her that she won't see her Gyandari ever again....
william is so eaget to get the heck out of there ... cuz he feels that she's torn
Will is not stupid guys, he knows she doesn't feel the same. Y'all are just PK's fans, but Will is a good guy also.
Girl, I know you didn't just tell someone else to grow up. The universe can't contain that much irony.
what would have happened on Tamna if she had said these words? Would he have enough courage to go all the way in his confession? just wondering
